description:
After nearly 100 prototypes Scarpa has found that “just right” height. With its lightly padded collar, the Generator Mid will keep your feet happy while jamming or cranking 40 metres of offwidth. Scarpa’s Tri-tension rand braces your forefoot and drives your foot forward, adding power while edging. The rand uses soft and sticky M70 rubber and sits over your toes, giving you extra grip on tricky toe hooks. The rand is complimented by a full midsole and outsole, balancing flexibility with stiffness. All of this support enhances torsional rigidity, making long splitters a little more bearable.

  • Eco leather upper is chrome free and durable
  • Patterned upper keeps seams away from high friction areas for comfort while jamming
  • Lace protection on the first 3 loops, lets you shove your foot deep into cracks without wondering what that rock is doing to your laces
  • Tri-tension active rand tensions and supports your foot while driving it forward
  • Stretchy lightly padded tongue hugs your foot and adding the perfect amount of volume
  • Neoprene collar accommodates a wide variety of foot shapes and is just plain comfy
  • Low profile instep, good for crack climbing while giving your foot some freedom
  • Full midsole adds stiffness and support, giving you confidence while smearing and edging
  • Full length Vibram XS Edge rubber outsole for durability and grip
  • PAF heel system distributes pressure over the heel for a comfortable fit
  • Members typically downsize 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from their street shoe size
name: Scarpa Generator Mid Rock Shoes - Unisex
